name: codemap-server
description: CodeMap HTTP Server - 代码地图可视化服务

scripts.start: bun run build:components && bun run server/index.ts
scripts.dev: bun run build:components && bun run --watch server/index.ts
scripts.build:components: bun build server/components/lit/codemap-viewer.ts --outdir dist --target browser --external lit-html
